name: Imitater
description: Imitaters let you use two of the same plant during a level!
text: I remember the Zombie Wars back in 76, says Imitater in a raspy, old-man's voice. Back then, we didn't have all these fancy peashooters and jalapenos. All we had was guts. Guts and a spoon.

name: Peashooter
description: Peashooters are your first line of defense. They shoot peas at attacking zombies.
text: How can a single plant grow and shoot so many peas so quickly? Peashooter says, 'Hard work, commitment, and a healthy, well-balanced break-fast of sunlight and high-fiber carbon dioxide make it all possible'

name: Sunflower
description: Sunflowers are essential for you to produce extra sun. Try planting as many as you can!
text: Sunflower can't resist bouncing to the beat. Which beat is that? Why, the life-giving jazzy rhythm of the Earth itself, thumping at a frequency only Sunflower can hear.

range: all zombies in a medium area
name: Cherry Bomb
description: Cherry Bombs can blow up all zombies in an area. They have a short fuse so plant them near zombies.
text: 'I wanna explode', says Cherry #1. 'No, let's denotate instead!' says his brother, Cherry #2. After intense consultation they agree to explodonate.

name: Wall-nut
description: Wall-nuts have hard shells which you can use to protect your other plants.
text: 'People wonder how I feel about getting constantly chewed on by zombies', says Wall-nut. 'What they don't realize is that with my limited senses all I can feel is a kind of tingling, like a relaxing back rub.'

range: all zombies in a small area
name: Potato Mine
description: Potato mines pack a powerfull punch, but they need a while to arm themselves. You should plant them ahead of zombies. They will explode on contact.
text: Some folks say Potato Mine is lazy, that he leaves everything to the last minute. Potato Mine says nothing. He's too busy thinking about his investment strategy.

name: Snow Pea
description: Snow Peas shoot frozen peas that damage and slow the enemy.
text: Folks often tell Snow Pea how 'cool' he is, or exhort him to 'chill out'. They tell him to 'stay frosty'. Snow Pea just rolls his eyes. He's heard 'em all.

special: long delay between chomps
name: Chomper
description: Chompers can devour a zombie whole, but they are vulnerable while chewing.
text: Chomper almost got a gig doing stunts for the Little Shop of Horrors but it fell through when his agent demanded too much on the front end. Chomper's not resentful, though. He says it's just part of the business.

name: Repeater
description: Repeaters fire two peas at a time.
text: Repeater is fierce. He's from the streets. He doesn't take attitude from anybody, plant or zombie, and he shoots peas to keep people at a distance. Secretly, though, Repeater yearns for love.

name: Puff-Shroom
description: Puff-Shrooms are cheap, but can only fire a short distance.
text: 'I only recently became aware of the existence of zombies', says Puff-Shroom. 'Like many fungi, I'd just assumed they were fairy tales or movie monsters. This whole experience has been a huge eye-opener for me'

name: Sun-Shroom
description: Sun-Shrooms give small sun at first and normal sun later.
text: Sun-shroom hates sun. He hates it so much that when it builds up in his system, he spits it out as fast as he can. He just won't abide it. To him, sun is crass.

special: removes graves
name: Grave Buster
description: Plant Grave Busters on graves to remove the graves.
text: Despite Grave Buster's fearsome appearance, he wants everyone to know that he loves kittens and spends his off hours volunteering at a local zombie rehabilitation center. 'It's just the right thing to do', he says.

special: makes a zombie fight for you
name: Hypno-Shroom
description: When eaten, Hypno-Shrooms will make a zombie turn around and fight for you.
text: 'Zombies are our friends', asserts Hypno-Shroom. 'They're badly misunderstood creatures who play a valuable role in our ecology. We can and should do more to bring them round to our way of thinking'.

special: stops shooting when enemy is close
name: Scaredy-Shroom
description: Scaredy-Shrooms are long-rated shooters that hide when enemies get near them.
text: 'Who's there?' Whispers Scaredy-Shroom, voice barely audible. 'Go away. I don't want to see anybody. Unless it's the man from the circus'.

name: Ice-Shroom
description: Ice-Shrooms temporarily immobilize all zombies on the screen.
text: Ice-Shrooms frowns, not because he's unhappy or because he disapproves, but because of a chilhood injury that left his facial nerves paralyzed.

range: all zombies in a huge area
special: leaves a crater
name: Doom-Shroom
description: Doom-shrooms destroy everything in a large area and leave a crater that can't be planted on.
text: 'You're lucky I'm on your side', says Doom-shroom. 'I could destroy everything you hold dear. It wouldn't be hard'.

special: non-aquatic plants can be planted on top of it
name: Lily Pad
description: Lily pads let you plant non-aquatic plants on top of them.
text: Lily Pad never complains. Lily Pad never wants to know what's going on. Put a plant on top of Lily Pad, he won't say a thing. Does he have startling opinions or shocking secrets? Nobody knows. Lily Pad keeps it all inside.

range: short range, hits all zombies that it lands on
name: Squash
description: Squashes will smash the first zombie that gets close to it.
text: 'I'm ready!' yells Squash. 'Let's do it! Put me in! There's nobody better! I'm your guy! C'mon! Whaddya waiting for? I need this!'

name: Threepeater
description: Threepeaters shoot peas in three lanes.
text: Threepeater likes reading, backgammon and long periods of immobility in the park. Threepeater enjoys going to shows, particulary modern jazz. 'I'm just looking for that special someone', he says. Threepeater's favorite number is 5.

name: Tangle Kelp
description: Tangle Kelp are aquatic plants that pull the first zombie that nears them underwater.
text: 'I'm totally invisible', Tangle Kelp thinks to himself. 'I'll hide here just below the surface and nobody will see me'. His friends tell him they can see him perfectly well, but he'll never change.

name: Jalapeno
description: Jalapenos destroy an entire lane of zombies.
text: 'NNNNNGGGGGG!!!!!!!!!' Jalapeno says. He's not going to explode, not this time. But soon. Oh, so soon. It's close. He knows it, he can feel it, his whole life's been leading up to this moment.

range: all zombies that walk over it
special: can't be eaten by zombies
name: Spikeweed
description: Spikeweeds pop tires and hurt any zombies that step on them.
text: Hockey is Spikeweed's obsession. He's got box seat season tickets. He keeps close track of his favorite players. And he consistently cleans up in the office hockey pool. Just one problem: he's terrified of pucks.

special: doubles the damage of peas that pass through it. Fireballs deal damage to nearby zombies on impact
name: Torchwood
description: Torchwoods turn peas that pass through them into fireballs that deal twice as much damage.
text: Everybody likes and respects Torchwood. They like him for his integrity, for his steadfast friendship, for his ability to greatly maximize pea damage. But Torchwood has a secret: he can't read.

special: can't be vaulted or jumped over
name: Tall-nut
description: Tall-nuts are heavy-duty wall plants that can't be vaulted over.
text: People wonder if there's a rivarly between Wall-nut and Tall-nut. Tall-nut laughs a rich, baritone laugh. 'How could there be anything between us? We are brothers. If you knew what Wall-nut has done for me...' Tall-nut's voice trails off and he smiles knowingly.

name: Sea-Shroom
description: Sea-Shrooms are aquatic plants that shoot short ranged spores.
text: Sea-Shroom has never seen the sea. It's in his name, he's heard loads about it, but he's just never found the time. One day, though, it'll go down.

special: lets you see through fog
name: Plantern
description: Planterns light up an area, letting you see through fog
text: Plantern defies science. He just does. Other plants eat light and excrete oxygen; Plantern eats darkness and excretes light. Plantern's cagey about how he does it. 'I'm not gonna say 'sorcery', I wouldn't use the term 'dark forces', I just...I think I've said enough'.

name: Cactus
description: Cactuses shoot spikes that can hit both ground and air targets.
text: She's prickly, sure, but Cactus's spikes belie a spongy heart filled with love and goodwill. She just wants to hug and be hugged. Most folks can't hang with that, but Cactus doesn't mind. She;s been seeing an armadillo for a while and it really seems to be working out.

special: blows away all balloon zombies
name: Blover
description: Blovers blow away all balloon zombies and fog.
text: When Blower was five he got a shiny new birthday cake. Blower made his wish, huffed and puffed, but was able to extinguish only 60% of the candles. Instead of giving up, though, he's used that early defeat as a catalyst to push himself harder ever since.

name: Split Pea
description: Split peas shoot peas forward and backwards.
text: 'Yeah, I'm Gemini', says Split Pea. 'I know, big surprise. But having two heads --or really, one head with a large head-like growth on the back-- pays off big in my line of work'.

name: Starfruit
description: Starfruits shoot stars in 5 directions.
text: 'Aw, man', says Starfruit. 'I went to the dentist the other day and he said I have four cavities. I've got --count it-- ONE tooth! Four cavities in one tooth? How does this happen?'

special: can be planted over another plant
name: Pumpkin
description: Pumpkins protect plants that are within their shells.
text: Pumpkin hasn't heard from his cousin Renfield lately. Apparently Renfield's a big star, some kind of... what was it... sports hero? Peggle Master? Pumpkin doesn't really get it. He just does his job.

special: removes metal objects from zombies
name: Magnet-Shroom
description: Magnet-Shrooms remove helmets and other metal objects from zombies.
text: Magnetism is a powerful force. Very powerful. Sometimes it scares Magnet-Shroom a little. He's not sure if he can handle that kind of responsibility.

name: Cabbage-Pult
description: Cabbage-Pults hurl cabbages at the enemy.
text: Cabbage-Pults is okay with launching cabbages at zombies. It's what he's paid for, after all, and he's good at it. He just doesn't understand how the zombies get up on the roof in the first place.

special: allows you to plant on the roof
name: Flower Pot
description: Flower Pots let you plant on the roof.
text: 'I'm a pot for planting. Yet I'm also a plant. HAS YOUR MIND EXPLODED YET?''

special: butter immobilizes zombies
name: Kernel-Pult
description: Kernel-Pults fling corn kernels and butter at zombies.
text: Kernel-Pult is the eldest of the pult brothers. Of the three of them, Kernel is the only one who consistently remembers the others' birthdays. He bugs them about it a little, too.

special: can be planted over another plant, wakes up mushrooms
name: Coffee Bean
description: Use Coffee Beans to wake up sleeping mushrooms
text: 'Hey, guys, hey!' says Coffee Bean. 'Hey! What's up? Who's that? Hey! Didja see that thing? Whoa! Lions!' Yep, Coffee Bean sure does get excited.

special: diverts zombies into other lanes
name: Garlic
description: Garlic diverts zombies into other lanes
text: Lane-diversion isn't just Garlic's proffession. It's his passion. He carries an advanced Doctorade in Redirection from the Brussels University. He'll talk all day about lane vectors and repulse arrays. He even pushes things into alternate avenues at home. Somehow his wife puts up with it.

special: protects adjacent plants from bungees and catapults
name: Umbrella Leaf
description: Umbrella Leaves protect nearby plants from bungees and catapults.
text: 'SPROING!' says Umbrella Leaf. 'Didja like that? I can do it again. SPROING! Woo! That's me popping up to protect stuff around me. Yeah. Just like that. EXACTLY like that. Believe it'.

name: Marigold
description: Marigold give you silver and gold coins.
text: Marigold spends a lot of time deciding whether to spit out a silver coin or a gold one. She thinks about it, weighs the angles. She does solid research and keeps up with current publications. That's how winners stay ahead.

special: melons damage nearby enemies on impact
name: Melon-Pult
description: Melon-Pults do heavy damage to groups of zombies.
text: There's no false modesty with Melon-Pult. 'Sun-for-damage, I deliver the biggest punch on the lawn', he says. 'I'm not bragging. Run the numbers. You'll see'.

name: Gatling Pea
description: Gatling Peas shoot four peas at a time.
text: Gatling Pea's parents were concerned when he announced his intention to join the military. 'But honey, it's so dangerous!' they said in unison. Gatling Pea refused to budge. 'Life is dangerous', he replied, eyes glinting with steely conviction.

name: Twin Sunflower
description: Twin Sunflowers give twice as much sun as a normal sunflower.
text: It was a crazed night of forbidden science that brought Twin Sunflower into existence. Thunder crashed overhead, strange lights flickered, even the very roaring wind seemed to hiss its angry denial. But to no avail. Twin SUnflower was alive, ALIVE!

name: Gloom-Shroom
description: Gloom-Shrooms release heavy fumes in an area around themselves.
text: 'I've always enjoyed releasing heavy fumes', says Gloom-Shroom. 'I know a lot of people aren't cool with that. They say it's rude or that it smells bad. All I can say is, would you rather have your brain eaten by zombies?'.

constraint: Must be planted on Lily Pads
name: Cattail
description: Cattails can attack any lane and shoot down balloon zombies too.
text: 'Woof!' says Cattail. 'Woof woof woof! Does this confuse you? Do you expect me to say 'Meow' like a cat just because the word 'cat' is in my name and I also look like a cat? That's not how things work around here. I refuse to be pigeonholed'.

special: melons damage and freeze nearby enemies on impact
name: Winter Melon
description: Winter Melons do heavy damage and slow groups of zombies.
text: Winter Melon tries to calm his nerves. He hears the zombies approach. Will he make it? Will anyone make it?

name: Gold Magnet
description: Gold Magnets collect coins and diamonds for you.
text: 'How did I end up here?' asks Gold Magnet. 'I was on the fast track --corner office, full benefits, stock options. I was gonna be Vice President of Midwestern Operations. Now I'm here, on this lawn, in serious danger of beign eaten to death. Ooh! A coin!

name: Spikerock
description: Spikerocks pop multiple tires and damage zombies that walk over it.
text: Spikerock just got back from a trip to Europe. He had a great time, met some wonderful people, really broadened his horizons. He never knew they made museums so big, or put so many paintings in  them. That was a big surprise for him.

constraint: Must be planted on 2 side-by-side Kernel-Pults
name: Cob Cannon
description: Click on the Cob Cannon to launch deadly cobs of corn.
text: What's the deal with Cob Cannon, anyway? He went to Harvard. He practices law in a prestigious New York firm. He can explode whole areas of zombies with a single corn-launch. All this is common knowledge. But deep inside, what really makes him tick?

range: all zombies in the fume cloud
name: Fume-Shroom
description: Fume-Shrooms shoot fumes that can pass through screen doors.
text: 'I was in a dead-end job producing yeast spores for a bakery', says Fume-Shroom. 'Then Puff-Shroom, bless'im, told me about this great opportunity blasting zombies. Now I really feel like I'm making a difference'.
